description: This file is a Python script used for generating C++ header and source files based on JSON schemas describing JSON-RPC interfaces. It includes functions for creating headers, emitting classes, enums, and RPC code, and manages dependencies and versioning.

methods.name: CreateApiHeader(log, source_name, path, headers)
methods.description: Generates a C++ header file containing JSON-RPC API declarations based on provided headers list, source name, and path.

methods.name: Create(log, schema, source_file, path, additional_includes, generate_classes, generate_stubs, generate_rpc)
methods.description: Parses a JSON schema to generate corresponding C++ classes, enums, version info, stubs, and RPC code based on flags. Manages file timestamps and conditional regeneration.

ctags.name: Create
ctags.pattern: /^def Create(log, schema, source_file, path, additional_includes, generate_classes, generate_stubs/
ctags.signature: (log, schema, source_file, path, additional_includes, generate_classes, generate_stubs, generate_rpc)
